column1: Clinical Associate in Psychology (Adult Mental Health) apprenticeship programme MSc
column5: Register your interest in graduate study at UCLThe course aims to train psychology graduates to become skilled professional Clinical Associates in Psychology (CAP), working within Adult Mental Health. This Master's programme provides the formal apprenticeship training required as part of the student's employment within the NHS. Students on this programme qualify as Clinical Associates in Psychology.
